  • Constructor Details

    • CourseList

      public CourseList(int capacity)
      Constructor to initialize the CourseList with a specified capacity.
      Parameters:
      capacity - the maximum number of courses the list can hold
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the capacity is less than or equal to 0

  • Method Details

    • addCourse

      public boolean addCourse(Course course)
      Adds a course to the list.
      Parameters:
      course - the course to add
      Returns:
      true if the course was added, false if the list is full

    • findDepartmentWithMostCourses

      public String findDepartmentWithMostCourses()
      Finds the department with the most courses.
      Returns:
      the department with the most courses, or an empty string if there are no courses

    • findMaxCreditCourses

      public Course[] findMaxCreditCourses()
      Finds the courses with the maximum credit value.
      Returns:
      an array of courses with the maximum credit value

    • removeCourse

      public boolean removeCourse(String courseId)
      Removes a course from the list by its ID.
      Parameters:
      courseId - the ID of the course to remove
      Returns:
      true if the course was removed, false if the course was not found

    • searchCourse

      public Course[] searchCourse(String keyword)
      Searches for courses by a keyword in their title.
      Parameters:
      keyword - the keyword to search for
      Returns:
      an array of courses that contain the keyword in their title

    • searchCourseByDepartment

      public Course[] searchCourseByDepartment(String department)
      Searches for courses by department.
      Parameters:
      department - the department to search for
      Returns:
      an array of courses in the specified department

    • searchCourseById

      public Course searchCourseById(String courseId)
      Searches for a course by its ID.
      Parameters:
      courseId - the ID of the course to search for
      Returns:
      the course with the specified ID, or null if not found

    • sortCourses

      public Course[] sortCourses()
      Sorts the courses by their ID.
      Returns:
      a sorted array of courses

    • getCourses

      public Course[] getCourses()
      Gets all the courses in the list.
      Returns:
